Detailed Description

DrmPermission specifies a DRM operation and constraints on that operation according to OMA DRM.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DrmPermission::DrmPermission (   ) 
 

DrmPermission::~DrmPermission (   )  [virtual]
 

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN DrmPermission::AddConstraint (  const DrmConstraint &  constraint  ) 
 

AddConstraint adds a constraint to the permission object. Note that OMA DRM currently defines 3 types of constraint. Therefore not more than 3 constraints of each constraint type can be added.

Returns:
TRUE on success, FALSE on error

const DrmConstraint & DrmPermission::GetConstraint (  INT  index  )  const
 

Returns a constraint for the given vector index.

DrmConstraintDefValues DrmPermission::GetConstraintDefaultValue (   )  const [inline]
 

GetConstraintDefaultValue returns TRUE if the constraint has default value. In that case content can be presented irrespective of the value.

INT DrmPermission::GetConstraintsCount (   )  const
 

Returns number of constraints available for this permission.

DrmOperation DrmPermission::GetOpType (   )  const
 

Returns DrmOperation according to OMA DRM.

BOOLEAN DrmPermission::IsAllowed (   )  const
 

IsAllowed will return TRUE if no constraints apply to operation.

INT DrmPermission::OnContentConsumedEnd (   ) 
 

If content has been consumed, OnContentConsumedEnd will update constraint internal state.

Parameters:
op Operation which consumes content
Returns:
TRUE on update of internal constraint state

INT DrmPermission::OnContentConsumedStart (   ) 
 

If content has been consumed, OnContentConsumedStart will update constraint internal state to indicate start of content consumption.

Parameters:
op Operation which consumes content
Returns:
TRUE on update of internal constraint state to indicate start of consumption

INT DrmPermission::OnRollback (   ) 
 

If content has been consumed, OnRollback will update constraint internal state.

Parameters:
op Operation which consumes content
Returns:
TRUE on updation of internal constraint state

void DrmPermission::SetConstraintDefaultValue (  DrmConstraintDefValues  def_constraints  )  [inline]
 

Set m_def_constraints.

BOOLEAN DrmPermission::SetOpType (  DrmOperation  op  ) 
 

SetOpType initializes the operation type of the permission object

Returns:
TRUE on success, FALSE on error
